Package io.github.ai4ci.flow

Class SimulationFactory

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
io.github.ai4ci.util.PauseableThread
io.github.ai4ci.flow.SimulationFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class SimulationFactory extends PauseableThread
Factory for pre-configuring and caching simulation instances for batch execution.

This class operates as a daemon thread that prepares and caches configured Outbreak simulations before they are executed by SimulationExecutor. It handles the computationally intensive setup phase separately from execution to optimize resource utilization and enable parallel execution.

Factory Workflow

  1. Setup Configuration: Creates base outbreak models from setup configurations
  2. Execution Configuration: Applies execution parameters to create runnable simulations
  3. Caching: Maintains a cache of ready-to-execute simulations
  4. Delivery: Provides simulations to SimulationMonitor for execution

Configuration Matrix

The factory generates simulations for all combinations of setup and execution configurations, creating a complete experimental design matrix: \[ N_{\text{simulations}} = N_{\text{setups}} \times N_{\text{executions}} \]

Caching Strategy

Uses a size-aware caching approach:

  • Default cache size: CACHE_SIZE simulations
  • Automatic memory estimation using Cloner.estimateSize(Object)
  • Dynamic cache size adjustment based on available memory
  • Pause/resume behavior to prevent memory exhaustion

Integration with SimulationMonitor

The factory coordinates closely with SimulationMonitor:

  • Notifies monitor when simulations are ready for execution
  • Responds to monitor requests for simulation delivery
  • Accepts cache size adjustments from monitor based on system resources
  • Reports status and progress to monitor for oversight

Performance Optimization

Key optimizations include:

  • Model cloning to avoid redundant setup computations
  • Memory-efficient caching with size awareness
  • Background thread operation to overlap setup with execution
  • Batch processing of configuration combinations
See Also:
  • SimulationMonitor
  • SimulationExecutor
  • Outbreak
  • SetupConfiguration
  • ExecutionConfiguration

  • Field Details

    • CACHE_SIZE

      public static int CACHE_SIZE
      Default cache size for pre-configured simulations

  • Method Details

    • startFactory

      public static SimulationFactory startFactory(List<SetupConfiguration> setups, List<ExecutionConfiguration> executions, String urnBase, SimulationMonitor mon)
      Starts the simulation factory with the provided configuration sets.

      Creates a complete experimental design by generating simulations for all combinations of setup and execution configurations.

      Parameters:
      setups - list of setup configurations for model structure
      executions - list of execution configurations for run parameters
      urnBase - base URN pattern for simulation identification
      mon - the simulation monitor that will execute the generated simulations
      Returns:
      a started SimulationFactory instance

    • cacheFull

      public boolean cacheFull()
      Checks if the simulation cache is full.
      Returns:
      true if the cache has reached its configured capacity

    • doLoop

      public void doLoop()
      Description copied from class: PauseableThread
      Repeatedly called while the thread is not paused or halting. This can interact with resources shared with other threads but needs to be synchronised on them (or use non blocking). This operates equivalent to a `while (!isComplete()) {doLoop();}`
      Specified by:
      doLoop in class PauseableThread

    • finished

      public boolean finished()
      Checks if the factory has completed all simulations and the queue is empty.
      Returns:
      true if all simulations have been created and consumed

    • getSimulationSize

      public OptionalLong getSimulationSize()
      Gets the estimated size of a configured simulation.
      Returns:
      the rough size of a configured simulation if known, empty otherwise

    • increaseCacheSize

      public void increaseCacheSize(int items)
      Increases the simulation cache size to improve throughput.

      Used when there is ample memory available and simulations are waiting for factory production. Larger cache sizes allow better overlap between setup and execution phases.

      Parameters:
      items - the new cache size capacity

    • isComplete

      public boolean isComplete()
      Description copied from class: PauseableThread
      Signify the thread loop is complete and can proceed to shutdown. This is checked even if the thread is paused.
      Specified by:

      Returns:
      true if the thread loop is complete and the thread should proceed to shutdown, false otherwise

      public boolean ready()
      Checks if the factory has ready-to-execute simulations available.

      true if the factory has simulations ready for execution

    • unpause

      public void unpause()
      Unpauses the factory if cache is not full.

      Only resumes production if there is capacity in the cache to avoid memory exhaustion from overproduction.

      Overrides:
      unpause in class PauseableThread
